title: Speculator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to attack. If you kill them, you are left with their corpse, and must bury it. (You cannot bury a body the same night you killed that player.)
- Bury (Night): You attempt to bury a body under the cover of darkness. Bury one corpse at the end of the night, but all visitors are informed of your suspicious behavior as they see you dragging around a body.
- Bury (Day): You attempt to bury the body by sneaking off during the day. Tomorrow, you are blackmailed, and at the end of the day you bury a corpse.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may perform one attack and one Bury each night.
- You appear innocent unless you possess 2 corpses or more.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Get away with 3 murders by burying their bodies.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
